SetCustomCursor
virtual void SetCustomCursor(
ssGUI::ImageData* customCursor,
glm::ivec2 cursorSize,
glm::ivec2 hotspot
) = 0

Sets the custom cursor image and hotspot.  The image data of customCursor is copied so it is fine to dispose it if needed.

GetCustomCursor
virtual void GetCustomCursor(
ssGUI::ImageData& customCursor,
glm::ivec2& hotspot
) = 0

Copies the custom cursor image to customCursor and returns hotspot of cursor.  customCursor & hotspot are unchanged if there's no custom cursor.

UpdateCursor
virtual void UpdateCursor() = 0

Updates the cursor. This needs to be called after a new cursor is set.

GetElapsedTime
virtual uint64_t GetElapsedTime() const = 0

Returns elapsed time since application startup in millisecond
